Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util

Class RowPrefixFixedLengthBloomContext

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.BloomContext
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.RowBloomContext
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.RowPrefixFixedLengthBloomContext
@Private public class RowPrefixFixedLengthBloomContext extends RowBloomContext
Handles ROWPREFIX bloom related context. It works with both ByteBufferedCell and byte[] backed cells
